guideline.success_criteria: input element or button is missing an associated label, it contains an alt attribute, or its label is empty

closest_fix.CoT:
Step 1: Identify all input elements and buttons in the HTML code.
Step 2: Check each input element and button for the following:
  - Whether it has an associated label using the "for" attribute or by wrapping the input element within a <label> tag.
  - Whether the label is empty or missing.
  - Whether the input element or button has an "alt" attribute, which is not applicable for these elements.
Step 3: If any of the input elements or buttons fail to meet the above criteria, then that would be the accessibility-related problem.
